title: Can Dmv garnish wages and bank accounts after chapter 7 if the viehicle dmv reg wasn't paid when I filed Chapter 7?
question: Hello, We filed Chapter 7 on July 28 2010 in Ca. Our discharged date was Nov 2009.Wells Fargo installment loan was listed in our BK for an rv. Registration expired on 07/14/09.
answers:
You really need to discuss this with your attorney. Income taxes for the last three tax years are not discharged. Some other debts survive bankruptcy as well. I am a little unclear who is trying collect and for what. Talk to your attorney to resolve this.

[This communication is intended as general information and not specific legal advice, and this communication does not create an attorney-client relationship.]
